comments.text: This battle is the biggest reason for why Germany lost the war we owe Slavic people a debt they paid in blood
comments.author: @33frag

comments.text:
They were the last Knights of Europe. Truly punched above their weight the entire war. Its incrdible how Germany persisted under the conditions. Fighting outnumbered up to 10 to 1 in some cases, and their cities systematically bombed tonrubble by the allies , and it still took the world four years to crush them.    Before the end the germans had developed new torpedo technology, rockets, the tiger tank, jet engine fighters, and even understood atomic theory but couldnt see it thru under comstant bombings. 

We cant forget the many foreign legions who volunteered to fight against the Bolsheviks.  The French volunteers were among the mast men defending the bunker in Berlin and refused to surrender until it was over
comments.author: @frauleinhohenzollern

comments.text: This battle is the biggest reason for why Germany lost the war we owe Slavic people a debt they paid in blood
comments.author: @33frag

comments.text: The Winter actually helped the Germans in this battle, freezing the mud that has slowed them since September/October.
comments.author: @Brslld
